website_summaries.verdict: It has a great fit and will not show wear or a change in color.
pros: Lightweight and durable, the bumper helps keep the corner protected, and it's easy to put on and take off
cons: There is no protection for your screen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks good on my iPhone! I purchased the iPhone just two weeks ago. The color is jack black and it is super easy to leave fingerprints on the back of the phone. On the other hand, I would like to show the color of my phone. This case meets my expectations and it does not make my iPhone look a lot bigger like other cases that might.
customer_reviews.author: poppy

customer_reviews.title: Great phone case
customer_reviews.text: Great phone case! I really like this case because it is flexible and clear. It can protect my phone very well, and the most great part is I can DIY my own phone case. I really like drawing and painting in the clear phone case. It looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Grease Monkey

customer_reviews.title: I like it, shiny
customer_reviews.text: I like it, shiny, clear, phone slips in easy, but felt the ad was very slick, borderline deceptive - buyer beware there is NO FRONT COVER. Also, was actually pretty annoyed the packaging was already opened, when you think you're buying a brand new product. Oh well, letting it slide this time, only $8.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: just love it. It's clear and won't make you feel ...
customer_reviews.text: I've replaced my heavy case with this light version, just love it. It's clear and won't make you feel there is a case around iPhone. I felt I got a totally fresh iPhone 7 plus.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: excellent product, fits perfectly and still let's you see the phone. Love, love, love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: No what I expected. Doesn't grip tight to phone ...
customer_reviews.text: No what I expected. Doesn't grip tight to phone and I didn't use it because the protection wasn't as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Ended up purchased two!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I have been searching for a nice looking case for my limited iPhone 7 plus product red. This case arrived in style. Check my pix out and it has a great smooth surface for user grabbing feel. I love it's crystal clear so it shows my iPhones uquie red color. Love it this ended up purchase an additional one as for buck up! Quick update - 7/18 still love this purchase! Had dropped once (accidentally) thanks for the awesome case! My iPhone is flawless! You should really get one! Trust me on this!!!! There is a reason for this case got all 5 star reviews! Really thankful for this case!
customer_reviews.author: Jay-Z

customer_reviews.title: First one cracked really fast (like within weeks) Thankful I ...
customer_reviews.text: First one cracked really fast (like within weeks) Thankful I had the second one so I’ve been using that (about two months now).
customer_reviews.author: James R. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Good case
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case because the one that I bought from Apple was broken and I had to get a new one. But I didn't want to spend 40 dollars to buy another case so I bought this one. I love this case and this price is totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Lagan

customer_reviews.title: Nice thin phone case
customer_reviews.text: Works with my new iPhone, the case is really really nice and thin, it would ive my phone a lot protection if I can carefully use it, worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Button is better than my last case
customer_reviews.text: High Quality. Button is better than my last case. This one don't take my effort to press the button
customer_reviews.author: Jack Maury

customer_reviews.title: And this is my favorite! my iphone is well protected and looks classic
customer_reviews.text: I bought some iPhone case in different places these days. And this is my favorite! my iphone is well protected and looks classic.
customer_reviews.author: Carson

customer_reviews.title: Feels nice
customer_reviews.text: Love it .. looks great feels great in the hands too 👌🏻 really nice case
customer_reviews.author: Claudia h

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my friend. the frame is white and the back is transparent. looks fashion and you can hardly feel the weight! good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Kaiqing Wang

product_meta.title: FOXNOV iPhone 8 Plus Case, iPhone 7 Plus Case, iPhone 7 Plus/iPhone 8 Plus Shock Absorption Case Crystal Clear Cover Slim Soft Touch Durable Protective TPU Case with Bumper (Black)
feature_bullets: Compatible with Apple iPhone 7 Plus - 5.5 Inch.

Made with top-rated Bayer TPU and highly-elastic TPE bumper to offer excellent protection all around the device. SGS Drop Test Qualified, no damages was found on the phone after 26 drops from 1.5 meters with this protective FOXNOV iPhone 7 Plus case.
Precision cutouts for all buttons and ports while featuring raised bezel to life screen and camera off flat surface.
Easy access to all buttons, controls and ports without having to remove your phone.
Soft touch & slim design. Easily slide in and out of pockets.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars22 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
